title: Illusions of Grandeur and Other Stories
description: Five short stories to entertain: Illusions of Grandeur: Nobody wants to become Someone. Is this possible? Can Anyone or Everything help? Law of the Jungle: Tigers and Monkeys! Not a good combination. As Monkey finds out, you canâ€™t always interfere. The Pen Box: A new arrival in the Pen Box is not all he seems to be. Archers Meadow: An unexpected spooky romance as Sophie starts her new life in the countryside. The Estate: This Estate has mysterious disturbances. Follow Mrs. Burroughs and her neighbours as they explore. Discovering a darker side.
author: T.S. Gwilliam
